Articles.Content:
![c0x21Ww.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c0x21Ww.jpg)

They're mining salt from Duna, warping to our solar system and selling it. KSC seems to be desperate for money.
Is the Ore-to-salt converter coming in the next update?
Uh, this topic got moved to The Space Lounge, even though it says "Off-duty chatter on any topic except KSP" ?
Yep, it's a bag of salt ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> They're mining salt from Duna, warping to our solar system and selling it. KSC seems to be desperate for money.

So does this mean Kerbals have finally found a use for food?

Fattening up humans, the sneaky little sods !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

> 
> So does this mean Kerbals have finally found a use for food?
> Fattening up humans, the sneaky little sods !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

More like causing hypertension, because it's salt.
I always thought the poles were ice or CO2, but now the cat's out of the bag...

> 
> I always thought the poles were ice or CO2, but now the cat's out of the bag...

Indeed it is.

Duna has apparently lots of salt in it, and I used to think that Laythe was the salty planet.

ThereÃ‚Â´s also a TV-Channel called Duna-TV. They make programs for Hungarians abroad.

![250px-Duna_TV.svg.png](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/de/thumb/5/5a/Duna_TV.svg/250px-Duna_TV.svg.png)

^ their logo ^

Kerbals start taking over our information programs, so nobody can tell us about their landings...
Let's not forget they unleashed a kraken on us back in the day

> 
> [http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/de/thumb/5/5a/Duna_TV.svg/250px-Duna_TV.svg.png](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/de/thumb/5/5a/Duna_TV.svg/250px-Duna_TV.svg.png)

Perhaps Kerbals have advanced in space exploration so much that they're planning on invading Earth?

They feed us Duna salt to make we acquire hypertension so that we die younger, and use the media to spy on us. Kerbal Conspiracy Program time.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T04:30:59Z" title="05/10/2015 04:30  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by windows\_x\_seven**
